phrasetype.name: vBulletin Settings
phrasetype.phrase: Enter the location of your vBulletin directory. E.g:(www.yoursite.com/vbulletin3). Do not add trailing '/'

To allow all user groups to access CometChat, leave this field empty. To allow only certain user groups to to access CometChat, specify them in this field. Each user group name should be separated with a comma. For example, entering "3,11,6" (without quotes) would allow users from user groups 3, 11, and 6 to be able to to access CometChat.
